description.fr: Lorsque votre héros traverse un adversaire ayant un {%ELEMENTARY_STATE}\_: Pose un {FloorMechanism:282} jusqu'à {cell:c} de l'adversaire traversé.
description.en: When your hero goes through an opponent with an {%ELEMENTARY_STATE}: Places one {FloorMechanism:282} up to {cell:c} from the opponent gone through.
description.es: Cuando tu héroe atraviesa a un adversario que tenga un {%ELEMENTARY_STATE}: Pone un {FloorMechanism:282} hasta a {cell:c} del adversario atravesado.
description.de: Wenn dein Held einen Gegner mit einem {%ELEMENTARY_STATE} überquert: Platziert ein\_{FloorMechanism:282} bis zu {cell:c} vom überquerten Gegner entfernt.
description.pt: Quando seu herói atravessa um adversário com um {%ELEMENTARY_STATE}: Posiciona um {FloorMechanism:282} a até {cell:c} do adversário atravessado.
